instructions: Cut Parmesan cheese into 1-inch cubes
Add cheese cubes to Vitamix container
Pulse 6-8 times until cheese is finely grated
tips: Use cold, firm Parmesan cheese for best results
Do not over-process to avoid turning cheese into powder
Store grated cheese in an airtight container in the refrigerator
